content.rendered:
Directed by Atlee

Written by Atlee. Ramanagirivasan. Atlee. Ramanagirivasan. Shanoor Mirza

Cast Joseph Vijay (Rayappan / Michael Rayappan (Bigil)). Nayanthara (Angel Aasirvatham). Jackie Shroff (J.K. Sharma). Vivek (Nessi). Kathir (Kathir). Daniel Balaji (Daniel). Anandraj (Anand , Rayappan’s friend). Devadarshini Chetan (Elizabeth). Prajuna Sarah (Elizabeth’s daughter). Yogi Babu (Donald). Arjan Bajwa (Samar). Amritha Aiyer (Thendral (The Football Team Captain) (as Amritha)). Varsha Bollamma (Gayathri). Reba Monica John (Anitha). Kanimozhi (Kanimozhi). Aadhirai Soundarajan (Minnoli). Riddhi Ramesh (Selvi). Indhuja Ravichandran (Vembu (as Indhuja)). Indraja Sankar (Pandiyamma). Gayathri Reddy (Maari). Vinaya Seshan (Thamarai / Goalkeeper). I.M. Vijayan (Alex). Tanive Hans (Manipur Girls Team). Gnanasambandam Gurunathan (Aasirvatham (Angel’s Father) (as Gnanasambandam)). Rama (Angel’s Mother). Manobala (Angel’s Professor). Rohini (Anitha’s Mother). Aathma Patrick (Michael’s friend (as Aathma)). Tsr (Michael’s friend). Nithyaraj (Michael’s friend). Arun Venugopal (Commentator 1). Ananthi Iyappan (Commentator 2). Raman Vijayan (Commentator 3). Sahithya Jagannathan (Commentator 4). Rj Ananthi (Commentator 5). Arun Alexander (Minister). Ashik Rahman (College Student 1). Kathik Shiva (College Student 2). Prabakaran (College Student 3). Shalini (College Student 4). Janani Balasubramaniam (College Student 5). Janani (College Student 6). Sumithra Selavan (College Student 7). Praveen (College Student 8). Keasv Sampath (College Student 9). Chaplin Sundhar (College Student 10). Praveen Kumar (College Student 11). Ranjith Anand (College Student 12). Kaka Balachandar (Gana Gang Member 1). Madras Miran (Gana Gang Member 2). Sherief.(Gana Gang Member 3). Pugazh Kalaikuzhu (Gana Gang Member 4). Mathew Varghese (Police inspector). Anish Kuruvilla (Delhi Police inspector). KS Jairam (Delhi Police Patel). Keerthana (Michael’s area resident). Nithya Raj (Michael’s area resident). Shanthi Mani (Michael’s area resident). Leo Thomas (Tn Boys Team). Stephen (Manipur Boys Team Captain). Manoj (Captain of Punjab Boys Team). Jamal Mohammed (Boys Match Refree 1). Palmson (Boys Match Refree 2). Bharani (Boys Match Refree 3). Madhan (Boys Match Refree 4). Sai Dheena (Dheena). Shama Khan (Haryana women’s team captain). Mohan Ravi (Girls Match Refree 1). Pooja (Girls Match Refree 2). Thulasi Kumari (Girls Match Refree 3). Surma Kumari (Girls Match Refree 4). George Maryan (Church Father). Shakthi Rithvik (Daniel’s son (credit only)). Abhi Saravanan (John). Justin Skinner (Soccer Coordinator). Soundararaja (Guna (as Soundarajan)). Gana Balachandar (Self and as a kuthu rapper in Rayappan’s area). Poovaiyar (Self in the song ‘Verithanam’ (cameo appearance)). A.R. Rahman (Self in the song ‘Singappeney’ (cameo appearance)). Atlee (Self in the song ‘Singappeney’ (cameo appearance) (as Atlee Kumar))

Languages Tamil

Producers Kalpathi S. Agoram. Kalpathi S. Ganesh. Archana Kalpathi. S.M. Venkat Manickam. Listin Stephen. Kalpathi S. Suresh

Production Goldmines Telefilm. AGS Entertainment
